original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘upacikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena upacikāya ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, upacikā upari chadanaṁ katvā attānaṁ pidahitvā gocarāya carati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja upacikā upari chadanam katvā attānam pidahitvā gocarāya carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlasaṁvarachadanaṁ katvā mānasaṁ pidahitvā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sīla savara chadanam katvā mānasam pidahitvā

original: piṇḍāya caritabbaṁ, sīlasaṁvarachadanena kho, mahārāja, yogī yogāvacaro sabbabhayasamatikkanto hoti.
analyzed: sīla savara chadanena kho mahā rāja yogī yoga avacaraḥ sabba bhaya samatikkantaḥ hoti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, upacikāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.

analyzed: mahā rāja therena upasenena vaṅganta puttena
